name: In re WTAE-TV, A DIVISION OF the HEARST CORPORATION, Pennsylvania Association of Broadcasters, Radio Television News Directors Association and First Amendment Coalition, Petitioners

parties: In re WTAE-TV, A DIVISION OF the HEARST CORPORATION, Pennsylvania Association of Broadcasters, Radio Television News Directors Association and First Amendment Coalition, Petitioners.

opinions.text:
ORDER
AND NOW, this 1st day of October, 1980, the Order of this Court dated September 20, 1979, shall remain in effect until further Order of this Court.

casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 1
In re WTAE-TV, A DIVISION OF the HEARST CORPORATION, Pennsylvania Association of Broadcasters, Radio Television News Directors Association and First Amendment Coalition, Petitioners.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 16, 1982.
